articles.title: Industrialist Keshub Mahindra passes away at 99 - The Indian Express
articles.description: Keshub Mahindra served as chairman of the conglomerate from 1963 to 2012.
articles.content: Keshub Mahindra, former chairman of the Mahindra & Mahindra Group of companies, passed away at 99 in Mumbai on Wednesday. He served as chairman of the conglomerate from 1963 to 2012.
